item.title: Customize and Experience SAP Fiori on the Cloud
item.description: As of today, you can customize and experience SAP Fiori on the Cloud. It is available, free of charge, for demo and prototyping usage with SAP Fiori apps across lines of business, SAP Fiori launchpad for a role-based, personalized access, SAP Web IDE for app customization and SAP UI theme designer for branding. Try it out today!
item.pubDate: Tue Nov 21 2016 11:12:35 GMT+0100 (W. Europe Standard Time)

item.title: Go-Live of SAP Fiori, demo cloud edition
item.description: SAP Fiori UX can be discovered and tried online for free. We are starting with the most prominent apps that apply SAP Fiori UX and will add new apps regularly. You will be able to experience the apps embedded in the Fiori LaunchPad and connected to sample data that is provided by SAP.
item.pubDate: Tue Nov 11 2016 11:12:35 GMT+0100 (W. Europe Standard Time)

item.title: Delight Business Users with a Personalized User Experience
item.description: Getting the job done anywhere and anytime is a key requirement across all lines of business for driving your enterprise in real-time. Now lean back and see how the new SAP user experience changes the way people work -- making the user experience personalized, responsive and so simple with SAP. Click to see the video.
item.pubDate: Tue Oct 21 2017 11:12:35 GMT+0100 (W. Europe Standard Time)

item.title: Modernizing the User Experience: SAP Fiori Now Included With SAP Software
item.description: SAP AG recently announced that SAP Fiori user experience (UX) will now be included within underlying licenses of SAP software. Click to read the press release.
item.pubDate: Tue Jan 21 2016 11:12:35 GMT+0100 (W. Europe Standard Time)
